job.title: Lead Software Engineer, Container Services - Tableau
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongTableau introduced the power of visual analytics to the world making it the defacto standard in the enterprise Tableau is as much a philosophy as an amazing suite of tools emstrongWe enable people see and understand their datastrongem helping people make important decisions based on those insights If you are passionate about technology but also care deeply about doing something meaningful Tableau is the place for you Tableau products have been helping fight global pandemics most recently COVID19 by providing data insights to the professionals and the publicbrbrstronguWhat We DobrbrustrongBesides helping people transform data to easy visuals we also have really fun architectural and scaling challenges strongContainer Services teamstrong in the Cstrongloud Engineering group strongdrives platform innovation for strongTableau SaaS strongproducts We explore new platforms technologies tools and bring the best to run Tableau SaaS We lead the Tableau SaaS transformation to Containers with strongDocker Kubernetes and AWS EKSstrong Along the way we adopted cool tools for strongInfrastructureasCode IaCstrong and strongContinuous Delivery CDstrongbrbrstrongTeam you will work inbrbrThe Container Services teamstrong is a talented and passionate group of engineers They are building a SaaS platform with AWS EKS infrastructure and a Deployment platform for release orchestration The team is incharge of migrating Tableau Online from AWS EC2 to EKS As trailblazers of Kubernetes in Tableau team members regularly guide other internal teams adopting Containers and Kubernetes As a core member of the Container Services team you will bring your creativity and expertise to the team for best practice guidance You will craft the Infrastructure Deployment and Migration strategies and oversee their implementationbrbrstrongThings you will do includebrstrongulliDesign build and optimize automated CICD pipelines and configuration management for Continuous Delivery of software to cloud environmentsliliCreate and configure infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code principles with a goal to reprovision environments at any point in timeliliAutomate Infrastructure and Application Deployments on private and public clouds preferred AWSliliDeploy troubleshoot Docker containers in Kubernetes preferred AWS EKSliliDrive operational cost reductions through Service Optimizations and AutoscalingliliDevelop and maintain provisioning security configuration and deployment proceduresliliEvaluate existing processes amp tools and implement changes for better efficiencyliliOrient feature teams in CICD platformtool training and troubleshootingliliParticipate in oncall rotations as neededliliDesign and implement Security and Compliance solutions to meet regulatory requirements such as GDPR FedRAMPliliUse these languagestoolsplatforms daily Python TypeScript Terraform KubernetesEKS AWS Linux CICD Its nice if you can employ your prior C or Java skills for objectoriented programming on this job We are always evolving and learningdeveloping new tools brliulstronguWho You ArebrustrongulliExperienced You have industry nonintern experience coding commercial software and a passion for solving complex problems You have a great understanding of cloud infrastructure technologies CICD tools You have solid development skills for InfrastructureasCode DeploymentasService You built these skills on top of your experience with objectoriented languages JavaCC You contributed to crossteam projects using Agile methodologies You have at least a year of handson AWS experience Its a definite plus if you built scalable services using open source or contributed to opensource projectsliliA True Team Player You enjoy collaborating learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers liliCustomer Advocate You understand customer requirements and prioritize for maximum customer  user experienceliliPassionate You are passionate about technology and the work you do You always want to do your best to delight the customers help your team and strive to excellenceliliYou are a Recruiter SalesforceTableau hires company builders and in this role you are on the lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue building one of the best companies in the worldbrliulstronguWhat You HavebrustrongulliBS in Computer Science or a related field or equivalent experiencelili6 years of industry experience in SaaS or largescale systemslili4 years acting as technical mentor in teams of 6 engineers developingimplementing platformsliulstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbruSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with uSalesforcecomu or uSalesforceorgu brbrSalesforce welcomes all
